original_text: ‘Israel's people have turned against me. Say to them, “Surely you must understand the meaning of this story.” Then say to them, “Listen! The king of Babylon came to Jerusalem. He took away Israel's king and his officers. He took them with him as his prisoners to Babylon.
korean_text: 너는 반역하는 족속에게 묻기를 너희가 이 비유를 깨닫지 못하겠느냐 하고 그들에게 말하기를 바벨론 왕이 예루살렘에 이르러 왕과 고관을 사로잡아 바벨론 자기에게로 끌어 가고

sentences.original_text: Israel's people have turned against me.
Surely you must understand the meaning of this story.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 이 이야기의 의미를 반드시 이해해야 한다.

sentences.original_text: The king of Babylon came to Jerusalem.
He took away Israel's king and his officers.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이스라엘의 왕과 그 관원들을 데려갔다.

sentences.original_text: He took them with him as his prisoners to Babylon.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들을 자신의 포로로 바빌론으로 데려갔다.
